fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • Because of an editing error, an opinion piece about Northern Ireland suggested nearly a third of the Democratic Unionist party’s supporters are Free Presbyterians. That should have said a third of the party’s members (Enough of this stalemate. A generation yearns for hope, 16 February, page 4, Journal). • A column in last Saturday’s Feast magazine (The new vegan, 10 February, page 15) referred to “King Kong kimchi”. That should have been Kim Kong kimchi. • Other recently corrected articles include: The best sights and bites in Hong Kong: readers’ travel tips Shetland review – the body count mounts in this stunningly bleak drama Kenneth Haigh obituary Laser scanning reveals ‘lost’ ancient Mexican city ‘had as many buildings as Manhattan’
